page.title: 18People.
page.content: {Mr Albon}is the village black smith.He has his hut by the village green.He makes fire grates and horse shoes and welds different things like tractors and farm implements.He works inthe village with his brother. { {Mr. Prentice }is the butcher. He has lived in the village all his life . He has his own shop in Castle Camps. His dad has one in Linton .His wife has horses and birds. He does not just sell meat .He sells fruit,veg, sweets and manure. He is very kind he gives Toby, Jake, and me sweets.His shop is a very popular one in the village.The meat is very good!
